https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oZYyisfvWY6N6KvC6cs9N6Anyht.jpg In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony. Asterix: The Mansions of the Gods
